overview: Kay experiences love and believes that it hurts. So she becomes cold and even averse to men. On the other hand, Cecile, who is beautiful and flirtatious girl, worships men and money. She is very proud of her boyfriend, Raul, a young executive who is already married. She is in direct opposite to Salma, who is extremely wealthy but is instead modest and very innocent in her relationship, with her materialistic playboy boyfriend. Then Salma finds out that her father is having an affair and will marry someone who is her age. Meanwhile, the curvaceous Donna has a habit of falling in and out of love and is the final wheel in this quartet of female friendship.
title: Cewe Matrepolis
